Uses of Interface
oracle.kv.avro.SpecificAvroBinding

  • Packages that use SpecificAvroBinding 
    Package Description
    oracle.kv.avro
    Binding classes for serializing and deserializing Values as Avro binary data.

    • Uses of SpecificAvroBinding in oracle.kv.avro

      Methods in oracle.kv.avro that return SpecificAvroBinding 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T extends SpecificRecord>
      SpecificAvroBinding<T>      		 AvroCatalog.getSpecificBinding(Class<T> cls)
      Deprecated. 
      Returns a binding for representing values as instances of a generated Avro specific class, for a single given class.
      SpecificAvroBinding<SpecificRecord> AvroCatalog.getSpecificMultiBinding()
      Deprecated. 
      Returns a binding for representing values as instances of generated Avro specific classes, for any Avro specific class.
